name: Remember (Mramerica108)
description:
Down to Earth, an interactive fiction game that is set between two different memories. No words, and a destroyed world. What memories are real? Which ones fake or corrupted? Are they even your memories? 

Very short game, produced for the Epic MegaJam 2019 Game jam. Experimental in nature, this is a prototype of a game found in my head. Having the foundation for something, would love to hear feedback. 

Controls:

F to switch memories

WASD to move characters

Mouse movement controls camera

Asset packs used: 

Dead Hills Landscape v2.0

Modular SciFi Season 1 Starter Bundle

POLYGON - City Pack
